## UtilitiesService.listDirectory() method

Read Directory List a directory on a NERSC system

- \*\*machine\*\*: the name of the machine to use - \*\*path\*\*: the remote path of the directory

**Signature:**

```typescript
listDirectory(machine: PublicHost, path: string): CancelablePromise<DirectoryOutput>;
```
